name: Ash
abl1Info: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.
abl2Info: Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.
abl3Info: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.
abl4Info: Project fierce shadow clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies. Join the fray using Teleport.
quote: This is Ash, lethal and elusive. Ash can remain unseen, but his effects on the battlefield can be felt by all. Keep an eye out, Tenno.

name: Atlas
abl1Info: Bash enemies with an exploding sliding punch, and repeat for a devastating combo. Petrified enemies take extra damage, and drop Rubble when destroyed. Rubble can heal Atlas and bolster his armor.
abl2Info: Summon a rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing towards the enemy.
abl3Info: Atlas' hardened gaze will fossilize foes, heal Rumblers, and create Petrified Bulwarks. When shattered, petrified enemies drop healing Rubble for Atlas.
abl4Info: Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee. Summoning petrifies enemies in close proximity to Atlas. When finished, Rumblers collapse into a pile of healing Rubble.
quote: This is Atlas, the brawler, the strong. Moving mountains is no easy task, Tenno. Atlas endures.

name: Banshee
abl1Info: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.
abl2Info: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.
abl3Info: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.
abl4Info: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.
quote: This is Banshee, stealthy and ranged. No one puts Banshee in a corner, Tenno. The element of surprise is in her favor.

name: Chroma
abl1Info: Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Chroma's energy color determines the element.
abl2Info: Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created. Chroma and his nearby allies are imbued with defensive energy.
abl3Info: When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases. Active for a limited time, maximum increases correspond to rank.
abl4Info: Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.
quote: This is Chroma, an ancient legend, master of the elements. When all the land is in ruins, Tenno, only Chroma will remain.

name: Ember
abl1Info: Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.
abl2Info: Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.
abl3Info: Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.
abl4Info: Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.
quote: This is Ember, destructive and deadly. Ember's presence on the battlefield is devastating. Mind the heat, Tenno.

name: Equinox
abl1Info: Switch forms, temporarily gaining bonus shields and armor in Night-Form, or bonus damage and speed in Day-Form.
abl2Info: In Night Form targets are put to sleep. In Day Form targets become more vulnerable to damage.
abl3Info: In Night Form reduces damage inflicted by nearby enemies. In Day Form increases Ability Strength of nearby allies.
abl4Info: In Night Form, allies are healed with each nearby enemy killed. In Day Form, nearby enemies are bled and then subjected to a wave of slashing force.
quote: This is Equinox, a deadly duality. A true Tenno must master the divide between night and day. Do you have what it takes?

name: Excalibur
abl1Info: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.
abl2Info: Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.
abl3Info: Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.
abl4Info: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
quote: This is Excalibur, a master of gun and blade. No matter your style, Tenno, the Excalibur Warframe is a formidable choice.

name: Frost
abl1Info: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.
abl2Info: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystallized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.
abl3Info: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.
abl4Info: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.
quote: This is Frost, colder and deadlier than space itself. Frost can protect or punish, the decision is yours.

name: Gara
abl1Info: Lash out with stream of shattered glass, or hold for an arcing strike.
abl2Info: Gara's armor splinters into a maelstrom of shattered glass that slices enemies and impairs their weapons. Allies who contact the cloud are fortified against damage.
abl3Info: Trap enemies in a carousel of mirrors, forcing them to attack visions of their true selves. Destroyed mirrors damage their attackers, as does the collapse of the carousel.
abl4Info: Create an expanding ring of molten glass that slowly crystallizes enemies who enter. When the expansion is complete, the ring hardens to block weapons fire. The ring draws extra strength from the health and shields of crystallized enemies. Use Shattered Lash to smash the ring and send razor-sharp glass flying outward.
quote: This is Gara, the unbreakable warrior. Manipulator of glass, she fractures the resolve of her enemies. The shattered remains of her enemies are all that Gara leaves behind. Tread lightly.

name: Harrow
abl1Info: Cast a wave of energy that chains them where they stand. Each enemy held reinforces Harrow’s shields.
abl2Info: Sacrifice shields to boost reload, and fire rate while converting damage inflicted on enemies into health for Harrow and nearby allies.
abl3Info: Channel Harrow’s energy into the Thurible to generate a buff. Once finished, kill enemies to bestow nearby allies with bursts of energy. The more energy channeled the greater the reward for each kill. Headshots produce extra energy.
abl4Info: Protect nearby allies with an energy force that absorbs all damage and converts it to a Critical Chance bonus for all those under the Covenant. Headshots are amplified even further.
quote: This is Harrow, the monastic, the ritualist. Harrow is suffragan to the Void. Will you believe, Tenno?

name: Hydroid
abl1Info: Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.
abl2Info: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.
abl3Info: Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.
abl4Info: Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.
quote: This is Hydroid, a deadly marauder from the deep. Whether the seas or the stars, Tenno, Hydroid takes a foreboding command of the battlefield.

name: Inaros
abl1Info: Blast enemies with a wave of cursed sand that blinds them and steals their health.
abl2Info: Hold power to trap target in quicksand and draw them in for devouring; this steals health and ultimately creates a friendly Sand Shadow.
abl3Info: Become a whirling spiral of sand that sends enemies flying and devours those trapped in quicksand.
abl4Info: Charge to transform health into hardened scarab armor. Discharge to blast enemies with a scarab swarm; survivors have their health drained and bestowed on allies.
quote: This is Inaros, the savior, king of the desert. Whether denizens of the sky or the earth, Tenno, the fear of Inaros is within.

name: Ivara
abl1Info: Cycle through and shoot one of four tactical arrows: Cloak, Dashwire, Noise and Sleep. In the Conclave, use the Null-Shield and Slow Arrows.
abl2Info: Assume control of a projectile and guide it to the target.
abl3Info: Become invisible and steal loot from unsuspecting enemies or take out prey with deadly headshots.
abl4Info: Summon a mighty bow and unleash a volley of devastating arrows.
quote: This is Ivara, the huntress, the thief. Don't roam around the forest looking for a fight, Tenno. Ivara is always on guard.

name: Khora
abl1Info: Send enemies reeling with a deafening whipcrack.
abl2Info: Bind a hapless target in living metal, entangling others who stray too close. Whipclaw will refresh the trap allowing it to capture more enemies.
abl3Info: Command Venari to focus on a target. Hold to cycle between Attack, Protect, and Heal postures. If Venari is killed, use this ability to revive her instantly.
abl4Info: Weave a dome of living chain that ensnares and strangles any enemy within, and any foolish enough to approach. Foes outside the trap will try to hasten their comrade's deaths by shooting them. Crack Whipclaw on the dome to further damage any trapped enemies.
quote: This is Khora, and her deadly beast Venari. With bladed precision, she is a mistress of entrapment. Don't get caught on the wrong end of a whipcrack of Khora's steel. It may be the last thing you hear.

name: Limbo
abl1Info: Casts a wave of Rift energy that damages hostiles while pushing enemies and allies out of Limbo’s current plane of existence.
abl2Info: Freezes Rift-bound enemies. While active, enemy projectiles are arrested in mid-air, resuming its trajectory when stasis ends.
abl3Info: Surges nearby Rift-bound enemies with Rift energy. When killed the Rift Surge is transferred to a nearby enemy outside the rift. Surged enemies that leave the Rift perform a radial Banish.
abl4Info: A violent blast of void energy tears open a pocket of rift plane which can sustain itself for a short period before collapsing in another lethal blast.
quote: This is Limbo, master of the Rift. In a land of both shadow and substance, Limbo is both nowhere and everywhere.

name: Loki
abl1Info: Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.
abl2Info: Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.
abl3Info: Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.
abl4Info: Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.
quote: This is Loki, the trickster, the deceiver. Whether you prefer to go into battle alone or with a team, Tenno, Loki will adapt to any style.

name: Mag
abl1Info: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.
abl2Info: Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.
abl3Info: Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.
abl4Info: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.
quote: This is Mag, a force to be reckoned with. Mag is a team player, Tenno, and a worthy addition to any squad.

name: Mesa
abl1Info: When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channeled through the next gunshot.
abl2Info: Gives an ally extra damage while jamming the guns of nearby enemies. This power shifts between team members.
abl3Info: Envelops Mesa in a barrier of energy, reflecting back incoming bullet damage.
abl4Info: With intense focus, Mesa draws her Regulator pistols, shooting down her foes in rapid succession.
quote: This is Mesa, the vagabond, the outcast. Do you feel lucky, Tenno? Mesa's got the fastest guns in the stars.

name: Mirage
abl1Info: Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.
abl2Info: Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.
abl3Info: Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.
abl4Info: Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.
quote: This is Mirage, a sly conjurer. Do you believe in magic, Tenno? Mirage's deceiving influence on the battlefield might make you.

name: Nekros
abl1Info: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.
abl2Info: Casts fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.
abl3Info: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.
abl4Info: Summons shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period of time.
quote: This is Nekros, manipulator of souls. Nekros possesses the battlefield, Tenno. Death is his playground.

name: Nezha
abl1Info: Blaze a trail of flames, scorching enemies and cleansing allies. Teleporting blasts the landing area with a ring of fire.
abl2Info: Hurl a flaming ring that sets enemies ablaze making them vulnerable to any damage. Flaming enemies drop Restorative Orbs on death. Charge to amplify the power of the ring, and reactivate to instantly travel to the ring's location.
abl3Info: Create a protective ring of fire, that also stuns and damage enemies who get too close.
abl4Info: Impale nearby enemies on spears that erupt from the below. Activate again to slam surviving enemies back into the ground.
quote: This is Nezha, the protector, the quick. Feel the heat, Tenno. Nezha is a burning thing, and he makes a fiery ring.

name: Nidus
abl1Info: Rupture the ground with a damaging fungal growth that steals energy from each enemy it strikes. For every five enemies hit, the Infestation mutates, multiplying its destructive force.
abl2Info: Spawn an Infested pod that erupts with tendrils, latches onto nearby enemies and pulls them in.
abl3Info: Bind to a target with a parasitic link. For allies, both the host and Nidus gain increased Ability Strength. Linked enemies take the damage inflicted on Nidus.
abl4Info: Gluttonous maggots swarm nearby enemies, feasting until they burst with Infestation. The maggots benefit from Mutation and each enemy consumed adds to the Mutation stack.
quote: This is Nidus, the adaptive, the scourge. Nidus is a deadly plague for which there is no cure. You must control the strange disease.

name: Nova
abl1Info: Creates anti-matter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets.
abl2Info: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision.
abl3Info: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.
abl4Info: Primes all enemies in a radius with anti-matter.
quote: This is Nova, wildly unpredictable. Nova's presence on the battlefield is complex and deadly. Handle with care, Tenno.

name: Nyx
abl1Info: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.
abl2Info: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.
abl3Info: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.
abl4Info: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.
quote: This is Nyx, manipulator of minds. On her own or with a group, Nyx can turn the tide of battle in her favor.

name: Oberon
abl1Info: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.
abl2Info: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.
abl3Info: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.
abl4Info: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.
quote: This is Oberon, the mystic, the willful. Oberon is an adept and honorable warrior, Tenno. Are you?

name: Octavia
abl1Info: Rhythmically beats damage into nearby enemies and draws their fire. Damage inflicted on the Mallet increases its lethality.
abl2Info: Launches a rollerball that charms foes to follow it. Combines with the Mallet to create a roving ball of sonic destruction.
abl3Info: Grants buffs to those who consistently perform actions in time to Octavia’s music. Timed jumps offer the Vivace speed buff. Crouching on the beat grants cloaking with the Nocturne buff. Firing rhythmically bestows Opera multishot buff. Timed melee swings give the Forte damage buff.
abl4Info: Draws power from the decibel level of sound in the area and uses it to amplify a damage buff for Octavia and her allies. It also doubles the damage and range of nearby Mallets.
quote: This is Octavia, the melodic, the maestro. If music be the food of death... play on, Tenno.

name: Revenant
abl1Info: Convert a target into a zealous thrall. Thralls turn on their allies and enthrall through damage. On death, they disintegrate into a damaging pillar of energy. The thrall horde remains under Revenant’s spell until this Ability runs out.
abl2Info: Become enveloped in Sentient energy, which redirects damage and stuns all those who dare attack. Stunned enemies can be Enthralled at no energy cost.
abl3Info: Dash through enemies as a wall of Sentient energy, leeching shields and health from any encountered, enhanced for thralls.
abl4Info: Erupt with a multitude of Eidolon energy beams and sweep a circle of death around Revenant. The beams will modify their Damage Type to target select defenses, while incoming damage is redirected back into the beams. Hold fire to boost Status Effects and Damage, at the cost of increased energy consumption. Thralls killed by this leave overshield pickups.
quote: This is Revenant, the returned - the condemned. Harnessing the essence of Eidolon and warrior alike, he mystifies and obliterates his foes. Revenant serves last rites for the souls he leaves on fire, without a plea for mercy.

name: Rhino
abl1Info: Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.
abl2Info: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.
abl3Info: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.
abl4Info: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.
quote: This is Rhino, an immovable force and highly resilient. Rhino can survive alone or become the cornerstone of any squad, Tenno. The choice is yours.

name: Saryn
abl1Info: Inflict a target with a pox of Corrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.
abl2Info: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.
abl3Info: While active, attacks deal additional Toxin damage; this effect is doubled for melee strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.
abl4Info: Releases a poisonous miasma that deals Viral damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.
quote: This is Saryn, elusive and deadly. Saryn is a deadly force on the battlefield. Get down with the sickness, Tenno.

name: Titania
abl1Info: Enemies fumble their weapons as they tumble into the air. Nearby allies become immune to Status Effects.
abl2Info: Extract an offering from an enemy in the form of a random Ability Buff. Survivor's attacks are weakened.
abl3Info: Create a swarm of razorflies that transform an enemy into an irresistible floating beacon, attracting witless comrades and finally exploding.
abl4Info: Shrink down and take flight, while razorflies attack nearby enemies.
quote: This is Titania, the pixie, the unseen. Titania is a deadly and mischievous addition to any squad, but don't take my word for it Tenno.

name: Trinity
abl1Info: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.
abl2Info: Allies will gain energy over time when enemies are marked with Energy Vampire.
abl3Info: Any damage taken while Link is active will be channeled to a nearby enemy.
abl4Info: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity's Affinity aura while giving them some damage immunity.
quote: This is Trinity, the healer, the equalizer. Trinity is a must for any high-stakes mission. She'll save your life, Tenno.

name: Valkyr
abl1Info: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.
abl2Info: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.
abl3Info: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.
abl4Info: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of vicious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.
quote: This is Valkyr, the tormented, the experiment. Valkyr was crafted from torment, Tenno. Take control of her rage.

name: Vauban
abl1Info: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.
abl2Info: Cycle through four deployable trap mines: Bounce, Trip Laser, Shred and Concuss.
abl3Info: Creates an energy-based containment field in which captives are held suspended in stasis.
abl4Info: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter.
quote: This is Vauban, focused and methodical. Vauban willingly sacrificed his own safety in the name of mayhem. Use him wisely, Tenno.

name: Volt
abl1Info: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.
abl2Info: Gain a brief boost of movement speed which affects all allies in range.
abl3Info: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.
abl4Info: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.
quote: This is Volt, a versatile warrior. Volt's arsenal is powerful and electrifying. Handle with care, Tenno.

name: Wukong
abl1Info: Explode the Iron Staff to its true length, knocking down anything in its path.
abl2Info: Escape death by receiving a boost of health when killed.
abl3Info: Evaporate into a cloud of mist and float through the battlefield.
abl4Info: Summon the Iron Staff and unleash fury.
quote: This is Wukong, the enduring, the swift. Everybody's got something to hide, Tenno. Except Wukong.

name: Zephyr
abl1Info: From the ground, charge and release to launch Zephyr into an airborne hover. From the air, tap to dash forward, or aim down to dive bomb enemies below.
abl2Info: Generate a burst of massively dense air that explodes on contact and sends enemies flying. Launch Airbursts into Tornadoes to make them grow.
abl3Info: Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.
abl4Info: Create deadly tornadoes that seek out and engulf enemies. Tornadoes deal the elemental damage type they absorb the most. Shoot enemies engulfed in Tornadoes to do additional damage.
quote: This is Zephyr, light, yet deceivingly lethal. Zephyr brings graceful destruction to the battlefield. Look up, Tenno.
